website_summaries.verdict: This long and cozy belted fleece robe makes it easy for men of virtually any size to stay warm on a chilly day.
pros: Available for “big and tall” sized men, making this a size inclusive purchase
There are many pleasing colors when purchasing this soft and cozy robe
Lightweight design makes it easy to wear, while simultaneously keeping you warm
cons: Material may be thinner than expected for some

customer_reviews.title: Softest, most awesomest robe in the world. BUY IT. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is AWESOME. As a larger, taller woman, I decided to finally swing for a man's robe. This thing goes all the way to the floor! I'm 5'10", and I got the XXL. I will probably go back for the L or XL size eventually because it's so big, but in the meantime, it's freaking awesome to have a robe that's TOO BIG for once in my life! Can I just live in this robe?! 'Cause yeahhhh. It's so soft. Also, mine had the string on the inside to tie. Now seriously. Go buy it. You're welcome. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rashel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Really soft, great fit, I'm 6'6" 215 and this robe is awesome. I really have a time finding clothing that fit my long arms and this robe is perfect for me. I purchased a large/ extra large size and everything fits exactly the way it should .
customer_reviews.author: Just do it!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing robe
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new robe for weeks, and could not find a terry cloth robe like my old one. I finally found this. I like the this robe because it has long sleeves and keeps my calves warm. It does run a bit large so I would suggest buying a size smaller than what you need. I felt comfortable buying this robe because of free returns if needed. It will keep you quite warm, which surprised me due to it's light weight. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Berk

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe
customer_reviews.text: 6', 240 and the L/XL was too small, though it looked like it should fit per the chart. Nice to have a free return, and XXL fits right. Light, warm, and comfortable. I haven't yet decided on the inside tie. It requires closing the left side first, which is not my habit. When tied, the inside tie is a bit scratchy. The cuffs are not oversized, which was always a concern with my old robe around our gas cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super soft and fun to wear
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I bought this to wear around the office. Everyone loves when I wear the robe!! People also take it and cuddle with the robe when I’m not wearing it!!
customer_reviews.author: KOBBrand

customer_reviews.title: Wrap Yourself Up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe, it is soft and warm and comfortable to wrap up in at night watching T. V. I am 5' - 10" tall and this robe does reach all the way to the floor which is good for warmth but not so good for not dragging on the floor when walking, I just lift it up and walk. The robe fits comfortably around and the tie works as it should. The material is thick and soft and feels good on a cold night! The color as shown on-line looks the same in real life,
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: Length is no problem, but for the price, the fabric is very thin. I was expecting something thick and cuddly soft, but got only the soft. The color is nice, and I'll leave it up to my husband whether to return it, but my first impression upon opening it was, "THIS was fifty bucks?" I ordered him another brand and he can choose which to keep once he sees them side by side. I personally wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.author: MeanAndPinchy

customer_reviews.title: Too comfortable to be real, but fuzz fuzz everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't shop online for clothing but I figured a robe was easy enough. This was a win as far as I'm concerned. It is soft and comfortable, and those two descriptions are understatements but I don't want to get censored for profanity. Only thing is you should wash the dang thing before using it because I am sitting here wearing it, writhing in comfort, but am covered in black robe residue/fuzz monsters. Other than that, the internal ties seem superfluous and I'll probably be cutting them off--the external tie/belt is sufficient. Get this for your dads/millennial friends for the holidays, this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: sih

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend. The fit was perfect and material very soft, but after 1 wash it came out of the dryer all fuzzy. Tried a couple more times and it only got worse.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: 6'6 and this actually fit pretty darn perfect
customer_reviews.text: Husband is 220lbs, 6'6 and this actually fit pretty darn perfect. Granted his ankles show- but that tends to happen all the time. Fabric was soft and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: V.O.

customer_reviews.title: The luxuriously plush material makes wearing this robe a joy. The color is a deep warm gray
customer_reviews.text: The luxuriously plush material makes wearing this robe a joy. The color is a deep warm gray. I'm a woman that stands 5'8". I weigh 210. The robe fits very well and covers down to my ankles. It's very warm and quite snugly. I recommend it be washed before it is worn as the manufacturing smell is strong and could react with your skin. That's not a drawback by any means. It's just a personal observation. My son is 6'3" tall and the robe was a good length for him as well. This will be next year's Christmas gift to him. I believe he will appreciate it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall people or anyone with muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 3XL And was shipped a 2XL...definitely was too small and very tight in the shoulder/arm areas and the sleeves were way too short, while the body extremely big. It was ordered for someone that was a 6’5 football player, and the sleeves were barely long enough for my 5’11” frame. Wouldn’t recommend for anyone y’all, only big.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: This is the ninth robe I've purchased in the last six months, by 5 different brands. Mainly looking for full length, plush luxury, comfort. This robe I received today is my favorite and best investment. I'm 6' even and 205 #s. The XL just at my ankles, the very softest, it is thin but very cozy and soft. I got black with gray trim looks great. I'm going to try a fleece lined flannel for winter, but this may be warm enough, I don't know yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Eklund

customer_reviews.title: S/M is probably a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering this in a S/M because usually when medium is coupled with small... the item will probably run smaller rather than larger. It worked out fine though! My boyfriend is 5’9” 175-180 lbs and it goes all the way down to his ankles. There is so much fabric, it fits quite nicely. Not to mention, there are three pockets! I’m not a fan of the Velcro on the top pocket but you forget it’s there sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great for large and tall ladies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS ROBE!!! I'm a 5'10" woman and I have such a hard time finding robes that actually come down as far as they should. This bad boy is actually a bit TOO long but I'm so happy! I'm 200lbs and ordered the small and it fits perfectly. It closes all the way in the front and actually hits the floor so I might take it up an inch or two so it doesn't get filthy. If you are a tall woman and tired of shin length robes I recommend you get this! If you are skinny it will be pretty big around but I love roomy robes!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I live in this now.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wanted a HUGE fluffy robe to wear around the house, and I am in LOOOOOVE with this one. I am not a big and tall man. I am a 5 foot 6 chunky lady. I ordered the biggest size so I would be swimming in it. It reaches the floor and I can wrap it around myself like a blanket. Best thing ever. So soft it feels like a hug. I'll actually be sad when winter is over and I won't be able to wear it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Aja O

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find plain white long robes for women so I tried this men’s robe. I’m 5’8, 193 lbs and this robe is just a bit long for me in length and arms and a very wide so a large probably would have worked better. But I had already worn so decided to keep. Pockets are nice and deep but in awkward place after wrapping robe. Nice and soft! Edit: got the large and it’s still way too big. these robes run on the large size so keep in mind when ordering ;-)
customer_reviews.author: YankeeFan

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this robe in November as a Christmas gift for my husband. The robe was very nice but it didn't fit even though I ordered his correct size. I wrote a review suggesting if someone were to order this robe they should order the next size up. Customer service at this company is excellent. They replaced the robe in a larger size. The robe fits my husband perfectly and the robe itself is very comfortable to wear. I definitely will order from this company again as I know they stand by their products. Linda Spohr
customer_reviews.author: Linda Spohr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. It is extremely soft and warm. It's not something I will use often in Florida but I am going to Denver over the holidays and it will be perfect there. It's like wearing a soft, comfortable blanket that covers your whole body. Note the length - it's good for me (I'm 5' 8") but would probably be too long for anyone shorter than that. I opted for a man's robe because all of the women's robes were too short. I have washed it several times with no shrinkage and it comes out of the dryer beautifully. Highly recommend this robe for men or tall women.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry N

customer_reviews.title: A little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves it. He’s 6’1”. He said it fits well in the sleeves and goes to mid calf. He’s had it one day, I’ll update if anything changes. Update: after a little more than 1 month, one of the seems have come undone. It’s on the left shoulder. I’ll probably hand sew it to fix it but that definitely gives a clue to the quality of the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: fuzzy on inside as well
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, and fuzzy on inside as well as outside, feels great against the skin, also the hip pockets are sewn "into" the robe, not sewn "onto" the outside, and there is a support ribbon that holds the pocket in a forward direction. i had a robe that did not have this and i was constantly shoving my hand into the pocket to get it laying in the forward direction. I'm going to buy these for my kids for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: chair

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice robe. It was a little thinner than my old robe but it is just as warm and toasty. The material is a little slipperier than my old robe as well as the waist belt slips a lot unless I slip it through twice. I did not really like extra the nylon inside the robe as hidden ties so I cut those off but the rest of the robe is great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug E.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: This robe runs very small. Also, the pockets really mess up the flow of the robe, plus all the ribbons connecting the pockets create issues. The belt loops (for the tie) are set very high and do not work for a guy with a long waist or normal build. The sleeves run very narrow for a big guy (ordered the XXL) and the shoulders are quite narrow. The material of the robe is nice, washes up well (little fuzz). I can return it at this point (yippee for Amazon's generous return policy!), however, so will do so. I do not recommend this robe due to its too-small size..
customer_reviews.author: nvr2amzd

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made - Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: So unfortunately this product in real life does not look like what is pictured. The robe, although very long, was manufactured poorly. The robe is soft, but is made of very thin material that is form fitting. The pockets were further located on my partners chest, rather than his hips. The loops for the tie were also located at his chest. Overall this robe seemed to be made for a tall woman rather than a man. I would not suggest this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: like a big nice warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can just wrap myself in it, and it covers my whole body! I'm 5'11", and I didn't like how my old robe only went down to my shins, leaving the shin/calf/ankle area cold and exposed. This is just what I needed for the chilly winter, and the sleeves reach past my wrists, too! It's acting like a wristpad while I'm typing this review. My only caveat is that this is for warmth/comfort, not for utility (if there is such a thing as a utility robe). The length can get in the way of certain things, and it will drag when you're walking up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ... ft and just about reaches the floor and is comfortable. The only problen I have is when when ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6 ft and just about reaches the floor and is comfortable. The only problen I have is when when washed it leaves little fabric balls on all your clothes. Suggest washing alone and wiping out machine afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the robe but at first the belt fell to the floor and I didn't realize there was one so be on the look out for the belt since it is not attached to the robe. Seems like a really great product so far. Update on review. Please wash it by itself the first time or everything in the wash will be covered in lint! Still like the robe and the fit is good even after cold water wash.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Rich Soft Cozy Robe
customer_reviews.text: This robe is long to my ankles and I am 6'0 tall. (XXL) It is made of a very plush velvety cloth, very soft to the touch. It is a thin cloth, which I prefer as it is not too heavy, bulky, or too hot to wear. I have washed it several times and it has held up well with no signs of wear or shrinkage. I do wash it in delicate cycle and as it comes out of the washer almost dry, I just air dry the rest of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very soft, long in total length and arm length. Dislikes are the loops for the robe tie are up too far. Meaning the loops are avobe the waistline. Also the robe could be a little thicker. It didn’t fluff up any after the wash. But overall it’s a nice robe Update...After wearing it for a while I am changing from 4 to 5 stars while the material is thin, it is plenty warm. Basically just as warm as my old thick, heavy one. So basically it is better. They tie could still be a little lower though.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE OLSON

customer_reviews.title: Size S fit 6'1", 140lb nicely
customer_reviews.text: Bought a grey size S for my 6' 1", ≈140lb boyfriend, he loved it. It was very soft and fit him well, reached just to the end of his wrists and down past his shins. It wrapped around his torso with just enough room to spare--I would recommend sizing up for larger guys. Came with inside ties.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Movius

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Long and Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am 74 inches tall and this robe goes all the way to my ankles. Do not buy unless you are almost 7 feet tall. Definitely do not buy if you have to walk in it in a house with steps, as you will surely fall. It is also much heavier than I expected. Donated it to a homeless person, who much appreciated it to use as a blanket - as it it quite warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and true to size. I was concerned that this was going to run small. The last one I purchased for him from another brand and different seller ran small, he was bummed. Ordering clothing online is hard when it comes to making sure it’s accurately described measurement and size wise. This one was extremely soft and fit great! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: GlamLab

customer_reviews.title: Buy this robe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself and I'm a female. Wanted a long cozy robe and woman sizes are always short. I'm 5'7 and got a small medium. It brushes the floor. Once tied and adjusted right it is perfect. The fabric is wonderful and can't believe it only cost under $20 bucks. Seriously it is a snuggly, great looking robe. Husband wants one now, he is jealous. Ordering him one too.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. It's long enough (I'm 5.7 and 128lbs) and it goes slightly below my ankles. Not sure why I can't add picture... Anyway, bought S/M size and it's not too large. All sizes are the same length so you don't have to buy a huge one to get the desired length. It's kinda thin, but warm and cozy. I just bought another color, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Not actually made for tall people.
customer_reviews.text: They kept the dimensions of a regular size robe and added material to the bottom. The belt loops place the belt at my belly button. The pockets cause me to put my arms at right angles. It is as long overall and as I hoped for, too bad that the placement of the major characteristics of the robe were not altered to work for a tall person.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: isnt even comfortable in it and she wears ladies XL
customer_reviews.text: I am 3XL and 6'7" tall. This thing is so small, especially the arms. My wife, isnt even comfortable in it and she wears ladies XL..Arms are tight on her. And it is thin material, static clingy, and just poorly made in general.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk n Mollie P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but dodgy stitching
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and comfortable. I thought the sizing was just right, actually a little long which is better than too short. The belt could use another loop but it's functional. My only complaint is the stitching for one of the pockets completely failed and is open across the bottom after only wearing it lightly around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but smaller than advertised...
customer_reviews.text: This item is comfortable and it is long, as advertised, but its definitely smaller than I expected it to be. Overall it's nice, but I have two main complaints about this robe: 1) The belt loops are almost in my armpits. They are literally 9" above my actual waist. 2) The sleeves are ridiculously narrow. My upper arms are tight in the sleeves. As much as I would love to pretend I'm a body builder with massive biceps, I'm not. I ordered the same size I wear in everything else, but I will be sending this back for the next larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: All the way to the floor
customer_reviews.text: This robe is perfect. I'm 5'6, 155lbs. I ordered a large. It wraps around me in super soft warmth. It's not too heavy at all. I love lounging around in it because it covers up my legs & feet. It really does go all the way to the floor. Even drags a bit. I do have to roll the sleeves when washing my hands. I haven't washed it yet but it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: This bathrobe is so soft and comfortable that you feel wrapped in luxury when you wear it. I love it. I'm 6 feet 1 inch and the length is perfect. Nice color, too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'1 and this robe hits him at the top of the ankle bone, perfect length! It is soft and well made and my husband says its weight of the fabric is just right, not too heavy or light. It keeps him warm and it is very nice to cuddle up to. I intend to update this review after a few washes to see how this material holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'3" tall, and weigh in at about 240# on a good day. I've seen more than a few decades, and of all the bathrobes I've owned over that time, this is the most comfortable. I bought the XXL, and do wish (1) the sleeves were looser and (2) that the pockets were larger, yet overall could not be more pleased. The length is just about perfect for a longer robe to keep the lower legs a wee bit warmer in colder weather. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JacksonK

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The robe is very soft. I expected a mens size to be much larger, though. The robe will barely wrap across the front of me. I wanted something very large to wrap up in and not come open in front when I sat down.So maybe a skinny person would get benefit out this robe, but otherwise, I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for myself because I am a tall big lady! I like white because it is easy to bleach, and looks fresh all the time. This road is very spa like! I have washed it at least five times and it feels just like it did when I opened it. I will be buying it in more colors it is awesome everyone who has touched it wants one! My kiddos love to snuggle when I am wearing it too!
customer_reviews.author: MamaOf5 Idahome

customer_reviews.title: Warm but small
customer_reviews.text: The robe is soft, light and warm. However, I was disappointed in the the fit. It was much shorter than pictured and the material generates enough static electricity to power a small appliance. The static can be corrected of course but it wakes up an old man with a pacemaker at first. I got it on sale and it was well worth what I paid, but at full price I would probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: XXl , Perfect fit/length. Glad I purchased it. Get the Navy Blue it has a top pocket and inner strings.Washed it in cold water with a little bit of detergent on a delicate cycle and there were no loose fuzzy's on the robe. I hanged dry it to avoid any shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: RRdowntown

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect for that Extra TALL Man
customer_reviews.text: My Son is 6 Foot 7 and overall just a Massive Guy. This hit's Mid Calf on him so is perfect for this Giant 16 year old of mine. If you have Giant's in your Family and they just want a Cozy Robe look no further than this. It will keep them happy! We all know that whenever we can find something like this our Big Guy's feel special that someone thought of them while designing Clothes. This is RARE!
customer_reviews.author: ROD G.

customer_reviews.title: Robes? ROBES! Great robe for the tall man or woman in your life
customer_reviews.text: Man, let me tell you, this robe is to die for! My husband is 6’6” and finding anything that fits him, especially online, is impossible! This robe fits him like a freaking glove and is soooooooo dreamily soft. He has very long arms and the sleeves stop just below his wrists, almost at the middle of the back of his hand! This robe is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beau.My.Dude

customer_reviews.title: Robe is the worst.
customer_reviews.text: Robe is made of material that leaves lint on everything. I have washed it twice and it is still terrible. The loops for the tie rope are as high as a person's armpits. don't buy this expecting quality. I'd return it but I have washed and tried to wear it but the lint just keeps coming.
customer_reviews.author: James HeinleinAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bathrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pretty big guy 6’5” and 285 lbs and it’s hard to find a robe that is long enough in every way. This robe has long sleeves that can reach my wrist and full length to get to just above my ankles! I really enjoy the softness too! My only complaint is the light weight of it. I will have to wear it spring and fall.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits great, feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I’m 5’6” and it goes all the way down to my ankles, so I’d say it’s a little longer than 59”... maybe 63”. I ordered the M/L but got a S/M, which fits perfectly in shoulders, waist, everywhere. I got the gray and black one, and it looks sharp. Highly recommend for lounging comfort for a dude. Or a chick.
customer_reviews.author: Guarddog255

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robe!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'10 woman and I wanted a floor length robe, so I opted to order a men's robe, hoping that it would be the length I wanted. I ordered it in an XXL, I wanted it to be roomy and comfortable to lounge in. This robe fits true to size and touches the floor when I wear it. It is extremely soft and amazing! I ordered another for my husband, he was jealous when he saw me wearing mine! I'll just be home Netflix and chilling it up in my new favorite robe LOL
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: fuzz everywhere.  nice, comfy robe.
customer_reviews.text: nice robe - big enough to be roomy - nice long length - i ordered the xxxl as you dnt want a robe to be snug - i'm 5'9" and it sits on top of my feet , sleeves are also more than long enough - need to be rolled up for washin hands or preparing food. only annoyance - it's been washed & dried twice and still fuzz everywhere - in the dryer, and all over whatever is underneath. hopin this will end soon. other than that it's a nice robe and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is pleased; wears it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and we are both very pleased with it. It fits as I expected, nearly reaching the floor and covering his wrists. We both love the dreamy softness and he is pleased with the roominess. The color is a beautiful jewel-tone that looks absolutely royal. I will update at a later time with information as to how it holds up in the wash, quality of sewing, and the longevity of the pile and plushness.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Grant

customer_reviews.title: Long, soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! I know its a mens robe but I'm tall for a woman and wanted it for the length. So glad I did, light weight, soft and long
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Robe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a big guy, 6'4" and 275lbs. I ordered a 3XL and it is very roomy and comfortable. The fabric is plush, but it doesn't shed. This isn't the first robe I've bought for him, but it's the first one he has actually liked and worn.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a full length for my husband b/c he is on blood thinners & is always cold. This is perfect. He doesn't like his clothes baggy & this fit him perfect. He wanted something long enough to cover his legs to keep them warm also & this robe does. He loves the soft feel of the robe & says it keeps him so warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: OOOOOHHHHH YEAH!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe!!!🥰🥰 I could never find a robe long enough in ladies, without spending a fortune. This robe is not only long enough, it's sooooo soft and light weight. It's very snuggely. For reference I'm 5'9", 216 lbs got a l/xl fits well with room to spare, plenty long enough goes to floor on me. White color is really white.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Very nice robe. Love the length
customer_reviews.text: Very nice robe. Love the length. A little warm for the summer but I am going to love it this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Edwinssiv

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. He love, love, loves it. He has long arms and was amazed at how well this robe fit him.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and a good company too!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of these robes in different colors/sizes. LOVE that they go all the way to the floor. Very soft. Medium/light weight. Keeps us comfortable when the A/C gets a little too cold in the evening. If anything ever happens to these robes, I will buy from this seller again. They are very thoughtful and make sure you are happy.
customer_reviews.author: TheBossTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Tall Guy Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6’3” and 220lbs, so it’s been difficult to find a bathrobe that fits and is comfortable. This bathrobe fits amazing!!! He loves it!! It’s super soft and comfortable, and the best part? It goes to his ankles! No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Who was this product even made for?
customer_reviews.text: The proportions are insane. Super long robe that is also extremely tight with very short arms & high pockets. Was this made for circus folk? IDEK... If you are of any kind of average size this isn't the robe for you. Waste of money & time.
customer_reviews.author: Arinna

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable robe! Wearing it right now.
customer_reviews.text: Washed first following Seller's instructions. No problem. I own a $1,500.00 washer and $1,500 dryer...brand new. Washed and the right pocket is almost a quarter coming off. Nothing a little Bit of Velcro could not handle. Very comfortable robe! I am 6 feet tall and 140 pounds. This road is super comfortable. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable but poorly sewn.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this robe. It is soft and just the right size. He just noticed that the seams are coming apart under BOTH arms. It was definitely sewn poorly. I would have returned it for a replacement but with the Covid-19 virus most of the UPS stores around us are closed. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it, I might steal it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my husband. Went a size bigger for that really comfortable, lazy, warm fit. He loves it. And I’m jealous and might order my own, honestly. He’s happy, warm, and content in his robe and I am also very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MSaar

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the weight of the fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the weight of the fabric, very light. I ordered a XXLT for my 6'5" and 260 pound father-in-law, for Christmas. The arms seemed mighty small, the length was shorter than I expected. I doubt my father-in-law will be able to put it on because of the opening of the arms being small. If he can't wear it, I will be donating it to the Good Will Store. $50 dollars wasted in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Branton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this robe
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by telling you how much I love this robe. If I could get away with wearing an all day I would. I I'm 5 foot 9 and this rope lays down to around my ankles on me. It is so soft and warm I just love it so much oh, I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: My 2-cants

customer_reviews.title: Not a true XLT fit
customer_reviews.text: The robe is long (even on my 6’4 boyfriend) but fits more like an XXXL and not a 3XLT, if that makes any sense.... the proportions were not right — the belt loops and pockets are way too high for a bigger/taller man. The quality seems ok; the robe is very, very soft. Overall, did not fit as a 3XLT should so I gave it to my brother who is a 2X and also 6’3 and it fits him a little better.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pass..
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. This robe fits weird. It is shorter than expected, and the belt loops are too high.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: SO soft, and a luscious blue color
customer_reviews.text: My husband is loving his robe and lounges around in it all the time. It is luxurious and soft, and the color is a very pretty cerulean type blue. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: RockPaperScissors

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got this robe for a friend and he loved it. He's about 5'11 and the robe comes down to about his ankles. He was looking for a big robe that would be comfy to wear around the house, and this fit that description perfectly. The material is also very soft- the robe feels more like a blanket. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: jessicaparks

customer_reviews.title: Really plush, warm, but not heavy or cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the robe - It is plush and soft and really keeps me warm without adding a lot of bulk. I have gotten more sensitive to drafts and chills the past few years and the robe really is nice for dealing with that. The fit was exactly as I expected, it looks nice and is comfortable. Win - win for me.
customer_reviews.author: kevin burke

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm bathrobe.
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault I ordered a size too large. But it is a very luxurious garment that will keep you warm and as soon as my wife hems it up I will start wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cannonito

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cheap product for the amount of money I paid for it. It is not Lush and it is not comfortable it's thin and I'm really very unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Big & Tall!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my husband. He likes that it is long enough to reach mid-calf and isn't too tight in the shoulders or chest. Super soft material - well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: cbradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Robe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Robe and it met all my expectations. The length was as described. The sleeves are long. The material was very soft as described. I would recommend this robe to anyone, certainly. I would, and I will, be buying this robe again when my new robe is wore out. Great job in delivery time too. I am pleased 100% :)
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Hardig Jr

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love these robes !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my boyfriend and loved it so much I bought 2 more for myself - so that I'm never without when I is in the wash. :D Material is soft and cozy and love the ankle length ! Perfect to slip into first thing in the morning or snuggle into by the fire on a cold winter's night. Absolutely love these !
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" tall 250 lbs and this is still big. Arms would do a man 6'5". It is floor length. Belt is the only thing small. I still rate it a 4 because it seems well made, comfortable and i like it. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: photobuff

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall men.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Sleeves too short. Not really made for tall men. Husband is 6’4” belt and belt loops were at chest level.
customer_reviews.author: K J F

customer_reviews.title: Love them 😊
customer_reviews.text: We got the men in our family these and slippers for x mas and i must say they were very soft and really nice not to thick but not to thin and very long but a little large around the belly area even for the bigger men in our family overall they were the perfect gifts and we loved the hoods
customer_reviews.author: Jamiiee

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband based of the size chart and it fits but it has a really weird cut. The pocket seem to be too high up on him. He liked it so we didn’t send it back but. I’m still shopping for another brand. It is super soft and didn’t have bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Autria Tutt

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy and long enough!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe for both men and women. I am tall as is my husband and we love these robes. They are warm and very cozy. Mine touches the floor almost and I am 5'11" and a large woman. My husband is 6 feet and big too and his just hits his lower ankle. Great buy too.
customer_reviews.author: Tish T.

customer_reviews.title: length and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Now, THIS is a robe!!! Truly ankle length and warm. Enough material to wrap and not gape open when sitting, but not so heavy as to weigh on you and keeps legs warm on those cold days without having to turn the heat up. I'd give it 10 Stars, if I could.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” female and bought the men’s small because all the women’s were too short even though I ordered tall. It covers my ankle but doesn’t hit the floor. It’s just what I needed, soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect especially for tall men. That is been the biggest hurdle was to find a robe that was long enough that he didn't feel like he was wearing my robe. The fabric is super soft and he says it is warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dutton

customer_reviews.title: A very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this as a Christmas gift! He is 6'4 so it is very hard for him to find a robe that fits his length and his shoulders too. The material is perfect and the fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. West

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the other half who is 6'4". It's a huge pain finding a robe for someone that tall that fits properly and is long enough. This one comes just three inches above the ankle, the fabric is super plush and he absolutely loves it. I'm impressed
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kline

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice but a bit thinner feeling than expected, overall it’s nice. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe!..
customer_reviews.text: Love,love, love this robe. The robe is long, I am 6 ft. Robe feels rich and luxurious, however for the price, the quality is worth the price point. Would buy another one as a gift. Pleased with the purchase. Robe fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: 6 foot tall - reaches floor!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband and I are 6'1, and this robe comes to our feet. The sleeves slightly cover my hands (which I count as a good thing. I can just roll the sleeves if necessary). They are very plush, three pockets (breast, and two hip pockets). The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas.. He is very tall.. He looks like a very striking in this robe.. It is very long..Soft.Washes and dries great.Does not lose color either.Great product.. I highly recommend this robe to buy. Pamela
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Robe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft. Purchased for my husband. He is 6ft 2 and this hits him lower shin/calf. Sleeves are the right lengths. He likes the pockets but a little thinner than I like, overall, a nice robe. I may just get one for me too. Don't put this robe in the dryer on high heat if you want it to stay soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy S.

customer_reviews.title: but still a good deep blue
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and plush, wraps well around. The blue is lighter than navy, but still a good deep blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hot, collects odors
customer_reviews.text: Buy a terry cloth robe. This polyester material gets too hot, smells strange new, collects many odors smelling worse after a few uses. It is not comfortable. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad by any means. Super-soft! But, it is a bit tight in the sleeves and across the shoulders. The sleeves are kind if short too. I'm not very tall or long-armed, and they don't quite make it to my hand. The belt is also a little shorter than I would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great color good length for 6’1” guy
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. He really liked it even though he’s more the PJs type. It’s quite soft and the color is great. I think he looks great in it and wish he’d wear it more than he does.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it. Bought the 3x one it is generously sized. Very soft and for him its warm. Washes beautifully and it does the job nicely
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Robe
customer_reviews.text: Finally a men’s robe that actually is long. It’s for my son that is 6’ and it is to his ankles not just to the calves. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This robe cost me money. Lol, I bought this one and my son fell in love and had to have one of his very own. It's gorgeous, soft, long and snuggly. Pricing was great (FOR ONE)..Guess I can write off the extra expense for the second, my son's adorable in his robe. He has to lift it like a skirt to walk. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jane

feature_bullets: FLOOR LENGTH DESIGN - Get the perfect robe in the length you desire! 59" in length across all sizes, the Ross Michaels Plush Long Robes are designed to be floor length for complete coverage and ultimate comfort.
CONVENIENT POCKETS - Easily carry around your phone, remote, or bottle opener in one of the two front pockets. When not in use, quickly hang your plush robe with the convenient woven-in loop.

ULTRA-COMFORTABLE - This Full Length big and tall men's bathrobe features a lightweight, luxuriously plush construction, that is incredibly fluffy soft and comfortable to wear. You'll love it so much, you'll wear it for everything from lounging around watching the game to keeping yourself warm on those winter nights or when you get out of the shower.
TIES SECURELY - Wardrobe malfunctions are a thing of the past. Thanks to the exterior belt, you'll feel plenty secure wherever you wear it.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Available in sizes S/M to plus size XXL and 3XL, see size chart for details. machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
